name: Roy Tang
text: Sakin kasi hindi na sya tumataas foe my regular trip. May 2 peso window lang where it fluctuates

source_obj.text: Sakin kasi hindi na sya tumataas foe my regular trip. May 2 peso window lang where it fluctuates

replies.text: Used to be 70-80 for me then went to 90-100 after the TRAIN law. Then 100+ na after uber died.

They’ve drastically lowered the incentives for drivers, causing a lot of drivers and operators to quit. Thus making it hard to get a ride, and thus the surge pricing. But drivers still complain that they don’t earn enough. So situation is just going to get worse
